summary: I'm a passionate innovator with an eye for detail and a drive to make an impact. I specialize in technology, consultancy, and thought leadership, and I have a knack for breaking down complex concepts into simple and understandable pieces. I'm always looking to use my skills to create meaningful changes, and I'm excited to see what the future holds.

projects.title: Global Learn to Win Summit in California
projects.description:
First-ever onsite face-to-face learning event with high quality presenters from P&I and Presales of SAP Ariba. Experts, providing the knowledge necessary for presales to be successful.

With support from Kelaai Richardson on the content side, I planned, budgeted, got approval and managed the realization of this summit - including strict control of expenses.

 •  194 participants from 39 countries
 •  41 speakers covering 47 sessions
 •  Best Practice Sharing, soft skills enablement, networking 
 •  Social-Conscious Team Building event resulting in 40 homes in Kenya receiving a new water filtration system

projects.title: 300M € Reverse Auction Consulting
projects.description: As sourcing manager of Eutilia, I supervise and advised on several auction strategies, for an accumulated value of +€ 1 billion  .  The most important auction conducted was for high voltage cable for a French Utility company with an estimated total value of € 300 million  and for which more than € 30 million savings were achieved (based on historical price).  This auction even was conducted on a single day.  I developed auction strategy theories for success and drove technology developments of the sourcing tool used at the time.

projects.title: Gold Fields Source-to-Pay integral solution
projects.description: Designed the solution for end to end (spend visibility, eSourcing, supplier information management, eProcurement with catalogues and services, einvoicing) using Ariba and mapped to the business process of Gold Fields (world's 8th largest gold mine) of South Africa.  Developed a detailed proof of concept and provided a business case analysis for the value to be expected from the project.

projects.title: Arcelor Mittal eProcurement and eInvoicing automation
projects.description: In context of consultative selling, I architected the business process solution for invoicing and procurement e-transactions for Arcelor Mittal (europe): scope of 13 ERP systems, 30k supplier+ and 22B+ in spend. Drove the business value discussion to include procurement with the eInvoicing initiative and scoped the entire project, deployment and technology approach, leveraging 2 supplier network providers.

contributors.headline: Chief Revenue Officer at Ping Identity
Enabling B2B Marketplace Payments  | Enterprise Sales |  Monetizing B2B Payments  |  Embedded Payments

profile_positions.description: As an Incubation and Pioneering Executive at Business Network, my role is to help businesses communicate better with each other. By creating a secure digital connection between their back-end systems, I'm able to speed up transactions, reduce the chance of errors, and make sure that data is exchanged in a way that both companies can understand. This allows businesses to save time, improve accuracy, and get their job done quicker. I also act as a Crypto-Blockchain thought leader within the Business Network, driving the exploration and use of the technology within the business environment.
profile_positions.title: Incubation and Pioneering Executive - Business Network

profile_positions.description: As a Blockchain Research Group Fellow for the SAP Information Center Network (ICN), I was responsible for developing a vision and strategy for SAP, learning from the sector's key players, and simplifying and widening the network. I collaborated with leading experts in the blockchain space to identify opportunities for growth and development, and worked to create a comprehensive understanding of the technology and its applications. I notably created and produced a 4-week business course about the fundamentals of blockchain and their potential impact for business, including guest speakers from UNICEF and the European Commission. Through my research and analysis, I helped SAP gain an edge in the blockchain space.
profile_positions.title: Blockchain Research Group Fellow

profile_positions.description: As a Global Senior Director Strategy/Innovations Presales, I drove innovation from within and to the procurement market. My responsibilities included thought leadership around agile procurement and disruptive technologies, such as blockchain, AI, Machine Learning, and IoT. I conceptualized procurement innovations and evangelized and publicly spoke on why and how procurement is about to be re-invented. Examples of the topics I covered included AI-driven tender and proposal submission, voice-activated procurement process, science fiction design thinking, and process amplification with smart dispensers and robots.
profile_positions.title: Global Senior Director Strategy/Innovations Presales

profile_positions.description: As the Head of Presales for the Spend Management Group, I was responsible for leading a team of more than 200 presales Solution Advisors in more than 40 countries. My goal was to increase presales sales by making them easier, faster, and with less duplication. Additionally, I promoted a thriving SAP solution as well as strategic industry-focused centers and encouraged the exchange of ideas and the development of new products. My focus was on thought leadership and content creation, including creating field-ready materials centered on solutions, storytelling, positioning, and simplification, as well as creating audio/video content to aid sales efforts. I also had a hand in influencing roadmaps and enablement through working with P&I and Solution Management.
profile_positions.title: Head of Presales - Spend Management Group

profile_positions.description: As a Senior Solutions Architect EMEA for Source-to-Pay, I presented procurement solutions and business networks through consultative selling. With a presence throughout EMEA, I concentrated on difficult or high-stakes sales pursuits and was responsible for thought leadership and collateral production on behalf of the larger "presales" organization. I worked to create a comprehensive understanding of the technology and its applications, and collaborated with leading experts in the space to identify opportunities for growth and development.
profile_positions.title: Senior Solutions Architect EMEA - Source-to-Pay

profile_positions.description: Consultative selling support and solution implementation in context of strategic sourcing and reverse auctions for the utility market in Europe.
profile_positions.title: Manager - Sourcing Services

volunteer_experiences.description: Built and deployed voluntarely the website bhutankurukulleadventures.bt for a travel organization in Bhutan - helping with local development for a pretty darn good trekking guide!
Provide graphic design support as well as on site volunteering for a non-profit music and event organization in Rotterdam, Netherlands.  http://gebouwdrie.nl/
